short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spoiler-free VBTV watching experience. Navigate the video using your keyboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
– Hide video length from video list view
– Hide video control bar from video player page
– Keyboard shortcuts to navigate video
  – Left/Right arrow: seek backwards/forwards 5 seconds
  – j: seek backwards 10 seconds
  – l: seek forwards 10 seconds
  – k/Spacebar: play/pause
  – m: mute/unmute
  – >: speed up playback rate
  – <: slow down playback rate
  – .: skip to the next frame while paused
  – ,: go back to the previous frame while paused
– Spoiler-free mode toggle
